mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SignReturn ( signReturn_id, mergedWaybillCode, busi_id, busi_name, return_cycle, operate_time, org_id, operate_user, merge_count,waybillCodes) VALUES ( #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{mergedWaybillCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{busiId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{busi_name,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{return_cycle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operate_time,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{org_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operate_user,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{merge_count,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{waybillCodes,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: SELECT signReturn_id, mergedWaybillCode, busi_id, busi_name, return_cycle, operate_time, org_id, operate_user, merge_count,waybillCodes FROM SignReturn WHERE mergedWaybillCode = #{waybillCode} OR waybillCodes LIKE concat('%',#{waybillCodeInMerged,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) OR waybillCodes LIKE concat(#{waybillCodeInMerged,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') LIMIT 1
